property_title: Ä°llusion Villas Luxurious 7-Bedroom Villa with Stunning Views
property_description:
Step into a world of luxury and elegance with this magnificent 7-bedroom villa, nestled in a serene location that offers breathtaking sea, city, and nature views. This remarkable property spans over an impressive 1000 square meters, providing ample space for both relaxation and entertainment.

Key features of this exquisite villa include:

- Expansive 1000 square meter area with 800 square meters of enclosed living space
- Seven spacious bedrooms, each designed for comfort and style

What sets this villa apart is its flawless blend of luxury and functionality. The property features a master bedroom suite with a balcony, dressing room, and en-suite facilities, offering a private retreat within your home. Additional rooms on both the upper and lower levels provide versatile living spaces to suit your needs.

The villa's private garden and pool area create an oasis of tranquility, perfect for unwinding after a long day, while the closed parking provides convenience and security for your vehicles. The inclusion of a winter garden ensures that you can enjoy the beauty of nature throughout the year, regardless of the weather.

This villa is not just a home; it's a lifestyle choice. Whether you're looking to entertain guests in style, relax in your private sanctuary, or enjoy the stunning views from your rooftop social area, this property offers it all.

property_title: Luxurious Villas in Tranquil Alanya Setting
property_description:

- High-quality finishes with designer ceramic tiles and granite fixtures

The project's location offers the perfect balance of serenity and convenience. Just 17 km from Alanya city center, 4 km from the beach, and within easy reach of both Gazipasa and Antalya airports, these villas provide a peaceful escape while remaining connected to essential amenities.

property_title: 4-Room Private Villa with Pool for Sale in Avsallar, Alanya
property_description:
Fully Furnished 4-Room Private Villa with Pool in Avsallar, Alanya – Modern Design and 600 m² Plot

Located in the tranquil district ofAvsallar, this impressivevilla for sale in Alanyaoffers both privacy and style—just1,000 meters from the sea(about 3 minutes by car or a 10–12 minute walk). Built in 2019 and thoughtfully designed, thisduplex propertyfeatures220 m² of interior spaceand sits on a generous600 m² private plot, making it ideal for both residential living and long-term investment.

With its stylish exterior, spacious layout, and modern amenities, this villa reflects the essence of Mediterranean living—comfort, sunlight, outdoor space, and seamless indoor-outdoor connection.

Exterior Overview – Pool, Privacy, and Eco-Conscious Design

Private Swimming Pool

At the heart of the property stands aprivate swimming pool, bordered by a sunbathing terrace and outdoor lounge zones. The pool features a unique glass façade that visually connects the water to the villa's interior.

Green Energy and Efficiency

The roof is equipped withsolar panelsand apower storage system, reducing utility costs and ensuring energy continuity.

Outdoor Dining and Relaxation

A well-designedgarden pavilion (kamelya)offers a shaded space for outdoor meals and relaxation. Nearby, abarbecue areainvites you to enjoy warm evenings with friends and family.

Garage and Security

Aclosed private garageprovides secure parking, while the entire property is monitored by acamera surveillance systemfor peace of mind.

Interior Features – Bright, Spacious, and Ready to Move In

This home comesfully furnishedwith a modern, tasteful décor that balances comfort with clean design. Large windows and high ceilings allow plenty of daylight, creating a welcoming and open atmosphere throughout.

Double-Height Living Room

The main living space featuresa tall ceilingand expansive glass walls that frame views of the pool and garden. The lounge is furnished with comfortable seating, a central coffee table, and a large TV unit. Decorative touches such asstone wall cladding, a built-infireplace, hanging lights, and indoor plants create a cozy yet elegant environment.

Open-Plan Kitchen

The kitchen is fully equipped withwhite cabinetry,dark countertops, and built-in appliances (oven, stovetop, extractor fan, and dishwasher). A wide island unit doubles as both a preparation space and casual dining bar.

Dining Area

Adjacent to the kitchen, the dining area features a modern table and chairs, with warm pendant lighting overhead that adds character to the space.

Sleeping Rooms

There are3 well-proportioned roomsacross the two floors. Each room includes a bed, wardrobe, and in some cases, work desks or extra storage. Decorative elements such asceiling fans,air conditioners, and accent walls (wood panel or wallpaper) add individuality to each room. Large windows bring in natural light, and some rooms providedirect balcony access.

Bathrooms

The villa includesthree modern bathrooms, all equipped with high-quality fixtures, glass shower cabins, and tasteful tiling.

Balconies

There aretwo balconies, ideal for morning coffee or sunset viewing. One features a shaded sitting area, perfect for private outdoor moments.

Private Sauna

A well-appointedsaunawith wooden interiors and large windows provides a relaxing space for wellness and recovery after long beach days or workouts.

Circulation and Staircases

Connecting the floors is a wide staircase with contemporary railings and stone steps. The upper level includes anopen gallery areaoverlooking the living room, enhancing the spaciousness of the home.

Location – Experience the Best of Avsallar

Avsallaris located west of Alanya and is known for its balance of nature and convenience. It has become increasingly popular among international buyers seeking a relaxed lifestyle without being far from the city.

Highlights of Avsallar:

  • Clean, sandy beaches and turquoise waters

  • Mostly low-rise residential development

  • Easy access to markets, bakeries, and pharmacies

  • Frequent public transport to Alanya center

  • Local weekly markets for fresh produce

  • Excellent opportunities for outdoor activities like hiking, biking, and swimming

  • Peaceful streets and a welcoming community

  • Strong rental demand and rising property values

Moreover, Avsallar’s quieter atmosphere makes it suitable for full-time living, not just vacation use.

Who This Luxury Villa Is Ideal For?

This furnished villa for sale in Avsallar is a well-rounded option for:

  • Families who need both indoor and outdoor space

  • Buyers looking for a fully ready home with no renovation needed

  • Foreign investors seeking a villa close to the beach

  • Those who want a second residence with privacy and full amenities

  • Buyers focused on energy-efficient homes with long-term value

Its combination of pool, garden, garage, and advanced infrastructure places it well above standard listings.

What You Get with This Property

  • 220 m² of indoor living space

  • 600 m² private plot

  • 4 rooms + open living and kitchen area

  • 3 bathrooms and 2 balconies

  • Private pool, sauna, kamelya, and BBQ

  • Garage, solar panels, and generator

  • Fully furnished and move-in ready

  • Security camera system

  • Only 1,000 meters to the sea

Let’s Help You Make the Right Move

AtLuxury Estate Turkey, we help clients find homes that fit their lifestyle—not just their budget. Our team offersfull legal and logistical support, from the first viewing to the key handover.

  • In-person or virtual viewing appointments

  • Assistance with legal paperwork and title deed

  • Guidance on utility setup, maintenance, and security

  • Interior and furnishing advice upon request

Furthermore, we act as your partner throughout the buying process—offering transparency, experience, and long-term support.

Interested in This Villa in Avsallar?

This modern duplex villa in Alanya offers comfort, investment potential, and Mediterranean lifestyle in one place. The location, size, and features speak for themselves.

Contact us today to receive:

  • Full price and ownership details

  • Floor plans, photos, and optional video tour

  • Information about foreign ownership rights

  • Guidance on payment options or possible cash discounts

Let us help you take the next step toward your new life in Avsallar.

property_title: Ultra Luxury Villa Infinity with Wellness & Panoramic View in Alanya
property_description:
When people talk aboutluxury real estate in Alanya, they usually mention square meters and amenities. But how do you put a price on the moment your shoulders drop and your breathing slows just because you stepped onto your terrace? That's the kind of luxury that doesn't show up in property listings – the luxury of coming home to peace- a kind of luxury that also qualifies you forTurkish citizenship.

Picture this: You wake up, pad barefoot to your kitchen, and while your coffee brews, you're looking out at the ancient Alanya Castle sitting proudly on its cliff, the endless blue sea stretching to the horizon, mountains rising like sleeping giants in the distance. This isn't a vacation moment you'll treasure forever – this is just Tuesday morning at your new sea view property in Alanya.

But let's flip the script for a moment. Forget the morning coffee – let's talk about coming home after a long day. You pull into your private parking, take the elevator up to your sea view home in Alanya, and suddenly the stress of the day just melts away. Why?Because you're watching one of the most spectacular light shows on earth unfold right in front of you.

As the sun sets, Alanya Castle transforms from ancient stone to a glowing beacon, its lights reflecting off the water like scattered diamonds. You can see the little houses clustered around the castle hill starting to twinkle to life – windows lighting up one by one as families settle in for the evening, the warm glow of homes creating a constellation against the darkening hillside. And above it all, the moon begins its slow climb across the sky, casting silver paths across the water that seem to lead straight to your balcony.

This isn't just a view you admire – it's therapy you live with every single evening.

Standing proud on 600m² of carefully planned land, this 525m² architectural masterpiece rises through four thoughtfully designed floors. But calling it a house feels almost insulting to what it truly represents. This is your private resort, your wellness sanctuary, your entertainment hub, and your peaceful retreat all wrapped into one extraordinary address.

The moment you step inside, the distinction between indoor and outdoor living dissolves completely. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls don't just frame views – they invite the Mediterranean landscape to become part of your daily life. Dark and light grey stone cladding gives the exterior a sophisticated strength that commands respect, while the interior's palette of whites, creams, and soft greys creates an atmosphere that breathes tranquility into every corner.

Villa Infinity brings you sea view in Alanya along with the benefit of Turkish citizenship eligibility

Here’s where Villa Infinity transforms from a beautiful home into a life-changing investment. This property is fully eligible for theTurkish Citizenship by Investment program, giving you and your family the right to secure a new future in Turkey with all the privileges that come with it.

And Turkish citizenship means more than just holding a new passport. It offers security in a stable country, access to quality healthcare and education, and the chance to establish your life in a vibrant Mediterranean city. For investors, it creates a foundation for long-term returns, while for families it guarantees a safe and welcoming environment to call home. Villa Infinity is therefore not only a residence, but a direct path to a stronger and more certain future.

Architectural Character & Exterior

This striking villa makes a bold first impression with its sophisticated blend of dark and light grey stone cladding that creates a powerful, contemporary presence. The extensive use of floor-to-ceiling glass panels and sleek glass railings doesn't just bring a modern edge – it frames the surrounding landscape like a living artwork, making the views an integral part of the home's design story.

The architectural language speaks of understated luxury, where every material choice has been carefully considered to create a sense of permanence and elegance that will age gracefully over time.

Interior Palette & Atmosphere

Step inside, and you're immediately embraced by a carefully curated color story that feels both fresh and timeless. The interior palette revolves around crisp whites, warm creams, soft beiges, and sophisticated greys – a combination that breathes serenity into every corner while maintaining an air of refined elegance. This isn't just decoration; it's the foundation of a lifestyle that values calm sophistication over fleeting trends.

The overall effect is one of spacious tranquility, where natural light dances across neutral surfaces, creating an ever-changing canvas of subtle shadows and highlights throughout the day.

Living & Social Spaces

The heart of the home showcases stunning white marble-effect flooring with clean, linear patterns that immediately evoke the luxury of a five-star hotel. But this isn't cold or intimidating – quite the opposite. The flooring serves as a beautiful backdrop for carefully selected furniture pieces that prioritize both comfort and contemporary style.

The seating areas feature plush, rounded-edge sofas and chairs with soft textures that invite you to sink in and stay awhile. These aren't just beautiful pieces – they're designed for real living, real conversations, real moments with family and friends.

Above, dramatic spherical pendant lights and strategically placed LED recessed lighting create layers of illumination that can shift the mood from bright and energizing during the day to intimate and cozy in the evening. The lighting design doesn't just illuminate spaces; it sculpts them, adding depth and drama to every gathering.

Dining & Kitchen Experience

The dining area centers around an elegant oval white table surrounded by minimalist chairs that capture the essence of Scandinavian modern design – clean, functional, and effortlessly stylish. This isn't formal dining that intimidates; it's a space that welcomes both intimate family meals and larger gatherings with equal grace.

The kitchen island and accompanying bar stools transform cooking from a chore into a social experience. Whether you're preparing a quiet breakfast or hosting a dinner party, the design encourages interaction and connection. The thoughtful integration of warm wood cladding against the predominantly white surfaces adds just the right amount of natural warmth, preventing the space from feeling stark or cold.

This is a kitchen designed for real life – beautiful enough for entertaining, practical enough for everyday living.

Private Retreats

The bedrooms continue the hotel-inspired luxury theme, with carefully selected headboards and linens that create an immediate sense of refined comfort. These aren't just places to sleep – they're personal sanctuaries designed for true rest and rejuvenation.

The master suite takes luxury to the next level with a bathtub elegantly integrated into the bedroom space itself. This bold design choice creates an immediate spa-like atmosphere, blurring the lines between sleeping, bathing, and relaxation into one seamless experience of personal indulgence.

Wellness & Mindfulness

Perhaps most uniquely, the villa features a dedicated wellness room that serves as a yoga and meditation sanctuary. Large mirrors amplify the natural light and sense of space, while a golden-toned Buddha statue provides a focal point for contemplation. The abundance of natural light streaming through oversized windows creates an authentic "zen" atmosphere that supports both physical practice and mental clarity.

This villa in Alanya represents more than just luxury living – it's a thoughtfully designed environment that supports both social connection and personal well-being, where every detail has been considered to create a home that's as beautiful as it is livable.

Outdoor Living with a Hawaiian Spirit

Step outside, and the property continues to impress.

  • Infinity Pool– Positioned to capture the full panorama of the Mediterranean and Alanya Castle, with glass barriers ensuring the view remains uninterrupted.

  • Garden Design– Inspired by tropical aesthetics, it combines palm trees, bright flowers, and lush greenery to create a feeling reminiscent of Hawaii.

  • Outdoor Shower for Two– A detail that blends practicality with indulgence, adding to the villa’s spa-like identity.

Every inch of outdoor space is crafted to extend living beyond the villa’s walls, ensuring both relaxation and activity are always at hand.

Outdoors with a Hawaiian Spirit

Step outside, and the property continues to impress.

  • Infinity Pool– Positioned to capture the full panorama of the Mediterranean and Alanya Castle, with glass barriers ensuring the view remains uninterrupted.

  • Garden Design– Inspired by tropical aesthetics, it combines palm trees, bright flowers, and lush greenery to create a feeling reminiscent of Hawaii.

  • Pavilion and Outdoor Kitchen– A fully equipped space for summer evenings, complete with fireplace for gatherings that last into the night.

  • Sports Facilities– A private badminton and floorball court brings recreation literally to your doorstep.

  • Outdoor Shower for Two– A detail that blends practicality with indulgence, adding to the villa’s spa-like identity.

 

Every inch of outdoor space is crafted to extend living beyond the villa’s walls, ensuring both relaxation and activity are always at hand.

Luxury Estate Turkey – Your Partner in Exclusive Living

At Luxury Estate Turkey, we know that purchasing a property like Villa Infinity is about more than square meters and features. It is about trust, guidance, and making a life-changing decision with confidence.

  • Expertise in Luxury Segment– We specialize in properties that stand apart, guiding buyers through exclusive options.

  • Full Legal Support– From residence permits to citizenship applications, we manage the entire legal journey.

  • After-Sales Commitment– Property management, rental services, and long-term support ensure your villa continues to deliver value and comfort.

  • Tailored Experience– Our team listens to your goals and designs a property journey to match.

  • Inspection Trips– For international buyers, we arrange personalized visits so that decisions are made with clarity and confidence.

 

Choosing Villa Infinity is about choosing a new standard of living in Alanya.Choosing us means having a reliable partner to secure that future.

This is Villa Infinity: a home that doesn’t just provide walls and roofs but orchestrates an entire way of life. With its wellness floor, panoramic terraces, Hawaiian-inspired gardens, and seamless smart home technology, it represents not only the best of Alanya but the best of contemporary living.
